item.title: 28+ free web development resources
item.description: Below you will find a curated list of resources I have found useful in my endevours designing and developing web applications. ðŸ’» Blogs Flavio Copes - seemingly endless articles on a wide variety of technical subjects. Most articles are related to web development. 7 Practical Tips for Cheating at Design - a great list of tips to keep in mind when doing web design. They do a fantastic job explaining the concepts, and the article is written to help developers who may struggle with design.
